findings.rationale: The five-year duration may not be sufficient for certain types of confidential information, potentially leading to exposure after the term ends.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: The ability to seek injunctive relief without posting bond may encourage frivolous claims or misuse of rights without adequate checks.
findings.evidence_quote: Therefore, the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: Restricting assignment without consent may hinder business flexibility and create potential delays in case of mergers or acquisitions.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
